resources.text: Sentences: present vs. past activities, to do something in the house, toward and away from , to wash or rub oneself or an object, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.031

resources.text: Sentences: prepositions, little and big things, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.032

resources.text: Sentences: questions and statements about a baby, to go home, mountains, to ride a horse, various ways to fish, to not know how to do something, to bathe or feed someone, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.033

resources.text: Guilfoy speaks in Atsugewi and Blake translates. Also, sentences about doing things fast and faster and about giving.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.034

resources.text: Sentences: to break down, to be all in pieces, to get dark, to be ashamed, to be drunk and to drink, to twist, to trip, to look cross-eyed at someone, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.035

resources.text: Personal account: Blake talks about speaking and forgetting Atsugewi, the sessions with Guilfoy, becoming Christian, and his grandson. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.036

resources.text: Personal account: Blake talks about his feelings about Atsugewi, differences between Indians and white people, being lonely, etc.. Guilfoy, Diane (researcher); Blake, Ramsey (consultant). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.037

resources.text: Story about Coyote. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.038

resources.text: Blake discusses his feelings and about forgetting his language. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.039

resources.text: Discussion of sweathouses, traditions, forgetting the language and working with Guilfoy. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.040

resources.text: Translation of texts from immediately preceding segments (those originally labeled 5:2). Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.

resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.042

resources.text: Discussion of storytelling, religious beliefs, the loss of language and culture, Coyote, Mt. Shasta, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.043

resources.text: Blake talks about prayer, his discomfort with teaching, traditions, his work with Guilfoy and the state of his language, alcohol and other drugs, white people, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 198.044

resources.text: Words and sentences: baskets, to learn, corrals and fences, to be ahead of or behind, fishing, to bother/pester, to throw up, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.

resources.text: Words and sentences: rabid dogs, poison, blue, kinds of birds, to be too bright, to interrupt, tastes, to be dirty, to climb up, etc.. Blake, Ramsey (consultant); Guilfoy, Diane (researcher). [1975-06]. California Language Archive.
